body: Of all the things that excite Japanese adolescence I cannot comprehend the randoseru. Panties, socks, naked aprons even swimsuits - make sense, but randoseru? Its like getting hard at watching someone haul a tackle pack.
They have to wear the backpacks? Thats a little strange, but then again this story is strange.
Huh, I don't know what to say about the story but, it was a good fap. Oppai-loli 4 U N ME!!!!!
